secure_lid.description: Make sure the rotation lid of the box is closed by swinging it on its hinge and securing it in place.

wipe_opened_rotation_lid.description: Wipe down the opened lid of the box to remove dust and debris and keep it clean.

close_rotation_lid.description: Close the rotation lid of the box by swinging it on its hinge.

clean_opened_rotation_lid.description: Clean the opened lid of the box to remove dust and debris.

unlock_lid.description: Open the rotation lid of the box by swinging it on its hinge to access the contents inside.

lid_in_place.description: Confirm that the rotation lid of the box is already closed.

wipe_closed_rotation_lid.description: Wipe down the closed lid of the box to remove dust and debris and keep it clean.

open_rotation_lid.description: Open the rotation lid of the box by swinging it on its hinge.

close_rotation_lid.description: The rotation lid of the box is already closed.

clean_closed_rotation_lid.description: Clean the closed lid of the box to remove dust and debris.

pull_drawer.description: Pull the drawer out from the box to access or place items inside.

push_drawer.description: Push the drawer back into the box after accessing or placing items inside.

slide_out_drawer.description: Slide out the drawer from the box for accessing its contents.

slide_in_drawer.description: Slide in the drawer into the box after accessing its contents.

check_drawer.description: Check the drawer of the box by pressing it to ensure it is functioning properly.

wipe_box_body.description: Wipe the body of the box to remove any dust or other particles and maintain it clean.

clean_entire_box.description: Clean the entire box, which include wiping the box body, rotation lids, and drawer.

access_all.description: Access every part of the box by opening the rotation lids and sliding out the drawer.

secure_all.description: Secure all parts of the box by closing the rotation lids and sliding in the drawer.

press_drawer.description: Press the drawer of the box to ensure it's working properly.

clean_box_body.description: Clean the body of the box to remove dust and any other particles.

clean_whole_box.description: Clean the entire box including the box body, rotation lids, and drawer.

open_all.description: Open all parts of the box including rotation lids and drawer.

close_all.description: Close all parts of the box including rotation lids and drawer.
